attributes.action: make the London Olympic committee scrap and change the ridiculous logo unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
